H1.0: How to buy Nortain VPN service

P.0: This document is a guide on how to buy Nortain VPN service. For downloading config files at Wireguard which is tunneled to Nortain VPN server, you should buy a plan first. Before buying a plan you must have Nortain VPN account first. Creating an account page is here. If you already have a plan but want to know how to use the Wireguard client this page will guide you on how to download and use the Wireguard client.
P.1: As you created an account you go to the pricing page to buy a plan. The pricing page is here. There will be plans which you can choose from. For each plan options of a plan are different. You can compare which one is better for you by reading the plans. After deciding which you want for a plan you click one of the toggle buttons. And then Click one of them you want to buy.
P.2: It is a case when you selected subscription plan. Subscription plan lets you use Wireguard VPN at Nortain server with paying monthly. Click 'Proceed to purchase'.
P.3: It is a case when you selected a plan without subscribing. This plan lets you use Wireguard VPN at Nortain server with a fixed term. Select months you want to pay for the plan in the range in the picture. And then click 'Proceed to purchase'.
P.4: As you click 'Proceed to purchase' button you will have a payment page. After putting your card information on the page and paying then you successfully bought Nortain VPN plans. You can download configuration files on this page.
